trailingComments.value: * * Returns an Observable that, when the specified sampler Observable emits an item or completes, it then emits the most * recently emitted item (if any) emitted by the source Observable since the previous emission from the sampler * Observable. * * * * @param {Observable} sampler - the Observable to use for sampling the source Observable. * @return {Observable} an Observable that emits the results of sampling the items emitted by this Observable * whenever the sampler Observable emits an item or completes. * @method sample * @owner Observable
